basis: User explicitly commits to starting now, specifies Sunday 9 am text reminders, requests setup for weekly check-ins, and mentions an optional midweek check-in. They also plan to report back after the next meal, indicating concrete intended action aligned with prior guidance.
cognitive_dissonance: Low. The user appears aligned with the plan and expresses clear intent without visible conflicting beliefs.
negative_thought_patterns: Minimal explicit negative self-talk. May carry a latent tendency toward all-or-nothing thinking in some contexts, but not evident in this message.
emotional_triggers: Heat (need for hydration), BED context (past slips), accountability and support needs (weekly/midweek check-ins).
coaching_notes: Continue providing ultra-simple, concrete steps and confirm the reminder setup details (text vs. app, time zone). Offer the optional midweek check-in as a flexible lever and ensure the user can opt in/out easily. Monitor for over-reliance on reminders and encourage proactive reporting after meals.
